thread.title: New Pet Rescue Show Pairs Homeless Dogs With the Perfect Owners
thread.title_full: New Pet Rescue Show Pairs Homeless Dogs With the Perfect Owners

author: Hedy Phillips
title: New Pet Rescue Show Pairs Homeless Dogs With the Perfect Owners

organizations.name: pd pitchford companion animal village and education center

text:
Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 New Pet Rescue Show Pairs Homeless Dogs With the Perfect Owners 
In new Z Living show Finding Fido , photographer and author Seth Casteel takes on the rewarding task of finding the perfect homes and people for shelter dogs. The show is based in LA and features area dogs that need homes and shows Casteel meeting potential owners and pairing them with the perfect companions. To help spread the word about the show, Casteel held doggy swimming lessons with rescue pups, so basically you already know it's going to be cuter than cute. Scroll through to see pictures of Harrod, a 7-year-old Terrier mix; Salem, a 2-year-old lovable mutt; and Cloud, a 1-year-old Poodle mix, who are all available for adoption, and North, a Chihuahua mix, who is a recent lucky winner of a brand-new family. 
For more information on the adoptable dogs, contact the Long Beach facility spcaLA PD Pitchford Companion Animal Village and Education Center . And don't forget to tune into the show on Z Living on Tuesdays at 9 p.m.
